Well said dude. Actually you don't need to put 10% of the effort you have sacrificed for your A/L's to get a 1st Class from our unis. In my opinion all our people can achieve high marks in their higher education if they focus on their study life and make university opportunities and facilities effectively. Our students are genius compared to majority of the world. I'm talking a with my experience working with foreign engineering students as a lecturer in the UK!!!

Might be true for some universities like the one you studied. In medical schools the effort you need to put in is probably around 1000% of what you put in for A/Ls. For the ones who are going to Medical Schools please be prepared for this demand.
